trans-unit.source: Represents a class that manages the current instance of a <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.StateMachineWorkflowActivity" />.
trans-unit.target: Representa uma classe que gerencia a instância atual de um <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.StateMachineWorkflowActivity" />.

trans-unit.source: This class cannot be inherited.
trans-unit.target: Essa classe não pode ser herdada.

trans-unit.source: This class also provides the query interface over the current instance of the <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateMachineWorkflowActivity>.
trans-unit.target: Essa classe também fornece a interface de consulta sobre a instância atual do <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateMachineWorkflowActivity>.

trans-unit.source: By using an instance of this class, you can make various queries on the <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateMachineWorkflowInstance>.
trans-unit.target: Ao usar uma instância dessa classe, você pode fazer várias consultas no <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateMachineWorkflowInstance>.

trans-unit.source: Typical queries that can be made are as follows:
trans-unit.target: Consultas comuns que podem ser feitas são da seguinte maneira:

trans-unit.source: Current state of the state machine.
trans-unit.target: Estado atual da máquina de estado.

trans-unit.source: Possible transitions from the current state.
trans-unit.target: Possíveis transições de estado atual.

trans-unit.source: History of transitions for the state machine instance.
trans-unit.target: Histórico de transições para a instância de máquina de estado.

trans-unit.source: Enumeration of all the states in the state machine.
trans-unit.target: Enumeração de todos os estados de máquina de estado.

trans-unit.source: The current workflow runtime.
trans-unit.target: O tempo de execução do fluxo de trabalho atual.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Guid" /> that indicates the instance of the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.StateMachineWorkflowActivity" />.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Guid" /> que indica a instância do <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.StateMachineWorkflowActivity" />.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.StateMachineWorkflowInstance" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância da classe <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.StateMachineWorkflowInstance" />.

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to create a new instance of a <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateMachineWorkflowInstance> object.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo a seguir mostra como criar uma nova instância de um <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateMachineWorkflowInstance> objeto.

trans-unit.source: This example is from the Ordering State Machine SDK sample.
trans-unit.target: Este exemplo é do exemplo de ordenação SDK da máquina de estado.

trans-unit.source: [!INCLUDE[crdefault](~/includes/crdefault-md.md)] [Ordering State Machine Sample](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/59272cf4-bc98-439c-bcfa-b66999ebce5c).
trans-unit.target: [!INCLUDE[crdefault](~/includes/crdefault-md.md)] [Exemplo de máquina de estado de ordenação](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/59272cf4-bc98-439c-bcfa-b66999ebce5c).

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="runtime" /> is a null reference (<see langword="Nothing" /> in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="runtime" /> é uma referência nula (<see langword="Nothing" /> no Visual Basic).

trans-unit.source: or
trans-unit.target: ou

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="instanceId" /> is an empty <see cref="T:System.Guid" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="instanceId" /> é um <see cref="T:System.Guid" /> vazio.

trans-unit.source: Gets the currently executing <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.StateActivity" />.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.StateActivity" /> em execução no momento.

trans-unit.source: The current <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.StateActivity" />.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.StateActivity" /> atual.

trans-unit.source: Gets the name of the current <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.StateActivity" />.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o nome do <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.StateActivity" /> atual.

trans-unit.source: The name of the current <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.StateActivity" />.
trans-unit.target: O nome do atual <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.StateActivity" />.

trans-unit.source: Posts a message to the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.StateMachineWorkflowInstance" />.
trans-unit.target: Posta uma mensagem no <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.StateMachineWorkflowInstance" />.

trans-unit.source: The name of the workflow queue.
trans-unit.target: O nome da fila de fluxo de trabalho.

trans-unit.source: The object to queue.
trans-unit.target: O objeto a ser enfileirado.

trans-unit.source: Posts a message to the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.StateMachineWorkflowInstance" />.
trans-unit.target: Posta uma mensagem no <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.StateMachineWorkflowInstance" />.

trans-unit.source: The name of the workflow queue.
trans-unit.target: O nome da fila de fluxo de trabalho.

trans-unit.source: The object to queue.
trans-unit.target: O objeto a ser enfileirado.

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.IPendingWork" /> that allows the sender to be notified when the item is delivered.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.IPendingWork" /> que permite que o remetente seja notificado quando o item for entregue.

trans-unit.source: An object to be passed to the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.IPendingWork" /> methods.
trans-unit.target: Um objeto a ser passado para os métodos <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.IPendingWork" />.

trans-unit.source: Posts a message to the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.StateMachineWorkflowInstance" />.
trans-unit.target: Posta uma mensagem no <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.StateMachineWorkflowInstance" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets the <see cref="T:System.Guid" /> that indicates the current instance of the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.StateMachineWorkflowActivity" />.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o <see cref="T:System.Guid" /> que indica a instância atual do <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.StateMachineWorkflowActivity" />.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Guid" /> that indicates the current instance of the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.StateMachineWorkflowActivity" />.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Guid" /> que indica a instância atual do <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.StateMachineWorkflowActivity" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets a collection of state transitions that the current <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.StateActivity" /> can make.
trans-unit.target: Obtém uma coleção de transições de estado que o <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.StateActivity" /> atual pode fazer.

trans-unit.source: A collection of state transitions that the current <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.StateActivity" /> can make.
trans-unit.target: Uma coleção de estado faz a transição que atual <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.StateActivity" /> pode fazer.

trans-unit.source: Provides a transition to a <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.StateActivity" />.
trans-unit.target: Fornece uma transição para um <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.StateActivity" />.

trans-unit.source: The name of the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.StateActivity" /> to transition to.
trans-unit.target: O nome do <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.StateActivity" /> para o qual fazer a transição.

trans-unit.source: Provides a transition to a specified <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.StateActivity" /> using the name of the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.StateActivity" />.
trans-unit.target: Fornece uma transição para um <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.StateActivity" /> especificado usando o nome do <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.StateActivity" />.

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="targetStateName" /> is a null reference (<see langword="Nothing" /> in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="targetStateName" /> é uma referência nula (<see langword="Nothing" /> no Visual Basic).

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.StateActivity" /> specified by <paramref name="targetStateName" /> is a null reference (<see langword="Nothing" />).
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.StateActivity" /> especificado pelo <paramref name="targetStateName" /> é uma referência nula (<see langword="Nothing" />).

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.StateActivity" /> to transition to.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.StateActivity" /> para o qual fazer a transição.

trans-unit.source: Provides a transition to a specified <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.StateActivity" />.
trans-unit.target: Fornece uma transição para um <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.StateActivity" /> especificado.

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="targetState" /> is a null reference (<see langword="Nothing" /> in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="targetState" /> é uma referência nula (<see langword="Nothing" /> no Visual Basic).

trans-unit.source: Gets a collection of state activities that the state machine workflow instance has transitioned through.
trans-unit.target: Obtém uma coleção de atividades de estado por meio da qual a instância de fluxo de trabalho da máquina de estado fez a transição.

trans-unit.source: A collection of transitions that the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.StateActivity" /> has made.
trans-unit.target: Uma coleção de transições que o <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.StateActivity" /> fez.

trans-unit.source: This property only returns the state history if the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingService> is used.
trans-unit.target: Esta propriedade só retorna o histórico de estado, se o <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingService> é usado.

trans-unit.source: An `InvalidOperationException` occurs if the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingService> is not installed.
trans-unit.target: Um `InvalidOperationException` ocorre se o <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingService> não está instalado.

trans-unit.source: If there is no state history for a newly created instance, state history is created without the instance being started.
trans-unit.target: Se não houver nenhum histórico de estado para uma instância recém-criada, histórico de estado é criado sem a instância que está sendo iniciada.

trans-unit.source: Gets the latest definition of the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.StateMachineWorkflowActivity" />.
trans-unit.target: Obtém a definição mais recente do <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.StateMachineWorkflowActivity" />.

trans-unit.source: The latest definition of the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.StateMachineWorkflowActivity" />.
trans-unit.target: A definição mais recente do <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.StateMachineWorkflowActivity" />.

trans-unit.source: This property only returns a copy of the workflow definition and never the live instance tree.
trans-unit.target: Esta propriedade só retorna uma cópia da definição de fluxo de trabalho e nunca a árvore de instância dinâmica.

trans-unit.source: Therefore, the activity tree that is returned by this property cannot be used to query for run-time values.
trans-unit.target: Portanto, a árvore de atividade que é retornada por essa propriedade não pode ser usada para consultar os valores de tempo de execução.

trans-unit.source: If the workflow has already completed, the current <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.StateMachineWorkflowActivity" /> cannot be retrieved, so the previous definition is retrieved.
trans-unit.target: Se o fluxo de trabalho já tiver sido concluído, o <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.StateMachineWorkflowActivity" /> atual não poderá ser recuperado, por isso a definição anterior é recuperada.

trans-unit.source: Gets a list of <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.StateActivity" /> classes in the <see cref="P:System.Workflow.Activities.StateMachineWorkflowInstance.StateMachineWorkflow" />.
trans-unit.target: Obtém uma lista de classes de <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.StateActivity" /> no <see cref="P:System.Workflow.Activities.StateMachineWorkflowInstance.StateMachineWorkflow" />.

trans-unit.source: A list of <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.StateActivity" /> classes in the <see cref="P:System.Workflow.Activities.StateMachineWorkflowInstance.StateMachineWorkflow" />.
trans-unit.target: Uma lista de <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.StateActivity" /> classes de <see cref="P:System.Workflow.Activities.StateMachineWorkflowInstance.StateMachineWorkflow" />.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="P:System.Workflow.Activities.StateMachineWorkflowInstance.StateMachineWorkflow" /> is a null reference (<see langword="Nothing" /> in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: O <see langword="Nothing" /> é uma referência nula (<see cref="P:System.Workflow.Activities.StateMachineWorkflowInstance.StateMachineWorkflow" /> no Visual Basic).

trans-unit.source: Gets the current <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowInstance" />.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowInstance" /> atual.

trans-unit.source: The current <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowInstance" />.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowInstance" /> atual.
